answers.text:
I checked with ICMA's Strategic Partner, Esri, about your question.  They tell me that GISP certification is often recommended, but rarely required for employees doing GIS work.  URISA (Urban and Regional Information Systems Association) has agreed to collect some examples of job descriptions in this field which we'll post to the Knowledge Network.

author: Damon Pettitt
text: Just curious if anyone out there requires job applicants (or current employees) to have a GISP certification in order to be employed at your organization to do GIS work.
title: Does anyone require job applicants to have a GISP certification?
